text: @realDonaldTrump BREAKING NEWS: White House sources stated that Trump is anxiously awaiting his nomination for a Nobel Prize in Medicine. Trump claims he invented the first test for COVID-19 long before Obama became President and left the shelves empty of COVID-19 tests.
